text: Gwyneth Paltrow is doing her bachelorette party right. The 45 - year - old actress shared a bright and breezy beachside snap on Friday, from her Cabo, Mexico bachelorette getaway. In the photo, Paltrow shows off a huge smile and her bikini bod on the sun - bleached sand. She captioned it simply : ` ` # costapalmas # henweekend,'' using the British term for a bachelorette party. Among the friends rumored to be joining the entrepreneurial actress for the chilled out bachelorette are pals Cameron Diaz and Stella McCartney. The mom - of - two has kept her engagement, to Glee producer Brad Falchuk, largely low - key since January when the couple publicly acknowledged it. They released a statement at
